channel.title: LinkedIn on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in LinkedIn on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Have you tried LinkedIn lately?
item.description: LinkedIn has been the business social network of choice for many and its nearly 10 years old, but younger upstarts have such a mass that its time to look at what LinkedIn can offer to social media marketing, especially for b2b marketing.

item.title: LinkedIn makes it easier to view who viewed your profile
item.description: LinkedIn has changed its settings so that basic or free users can now find out who actually looked at their profile in the last week.

item.title: Social Media Reputation Management using LinkedIn
item.description: Managing your online reputation will be more important over time for everyone - as we grow up the content and material that search engines will collect about us is phenomenal.
